name: WoodFruitPie
description:
A short, softcore story about two male high schoolers that have a crush on eachother.

WoodFruitPie is a visual novel adaptation of a written fiction I made back in 2016. Well ... turns out it's a kinetic novel, more specifically. It's also my first VN/ game ever ! So ... Yeah.

I hope this BL will bring some freshness to your day.

🍇 🍓 🍇 🍓 🍇 🍓 🍇 🍓 🍇 🍓 

Features :

🔹 Wholesome younglings' shenanigans

🔹 Less than 5000 words (approx 30 minutes)

🔹 11 hand-drawn illustrations

🔹 SFW and kinda gay, ig ?

🍇 🍓 🍇 🍓 🍇 🍓 🍇 🍓 🍇 🍓 

Credits :

🔹 Story, art and renpy coding by @RubykonCubes

🔹 Music / SFX is from  DOVA-SYNDROME , Bensound , FiftySounds and Orange Free Sounds
